comment: aromatase, ARO following after R02501 subsequently R03087
definition: 19-Hydroxytestosterone + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> 19-Oxotestosterone + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 H2O
name: 19-hydroxytestosterone,NADPH---hemoprotein reductase:oxygen 19-oxidoreductase
